projeto: Plano de Aula — IA na Educação Física Escolar

arquivos.descricao: Script principal — Geração do PDF Ultra Premium do Plano de Aula com IA na Educação Física Escolar
arquivos.finalidade: Gera o PDF institucional com 9 seções, cabeçalho e rodapé com faixas coloridas, tabelas, badges e layout de nível editorial

#!/usr/bin/env python3 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- """ PDF Ultra Premium — Plano de Aula Institucional Design de alto nível: cabeçalho/rodapé com faixa, tipografia profissional. """ from reportlab.lib.pagesizes import A4 from reportlab.lib import colors from reportlab.lib.units import mm, cm from reportlab.lib.styles import ParagraphStyle from reportlab.lib.enums import TA_LEFT, TA_CENTER, TA_RIGHT, TA_JUSTIFY from reportlab.platypus import ( SimpleDocTemplate, Paragraph, Spacer, Table, TableStyle, HRFlowable, KeepTogether, PageBreak ) from reportlab.pdfgen import canvas from reportlab.platypus.flowables import Flowable from reportlab.lib.colors import HexColor import os # ─── PALETA DE CORES ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── NAVY = HexColor("#0D1B2A") # Azul escuro institucional NAVY_MED = HexColor("#1B3A5C") # Azul médio TEAL = HexColor("#0E7C7B") # Verde-azulado accent GOLD = HexColor("#C9A227") # Dourado accent GOLD_LIGHT = HexColor("#F0D080") # Dourado claro WHITE = HexColor("#FFFFFF") LIGHT_BG = HexColor("#F4F7FB") # Fundo seções LIGHT_BG2 = HexColor("#EAF0F8") BORDER = HexColor("#BDD0E8") TEXT_DARK = HexColor("#0D1B2A") TEXT_MED = HexColor("#2C4E6C") TEXT_LIGHT = HexColor("#5A7A99") ACCENT_RED = HexColor("#C0392B") GREEN_OK = HexColor("#1A7A4A") STRIPE_1 = HexColor("#E8F0F8") STRIPE_2 = HexColor("#FFFFFF") W, H = A4 # 595.28 x 841.89 pts MARGIN_L = 2.0 * cm MARGIN_R = 2.0 * cm MARGIN_T = 3.2 * cm # Espaço para header MARGIN_B = 2.8 * cm # Espaço para footer OUTPUT = "/sessions/wonderful-bold-ptolemy/mnt/outputs/Plano_Aula_IA_EF_Premium.pdf" # ─── HEADER & FOOTER CANVAS ─────────────────────────────────────────────────── def draw_header_footer(canv, doc): canv.saveState() page_num = doc.page # ── HEADER ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── # Faixa superior total (navy escuro) canv.setFillColor(NAVY) canv.rect(0, H - 22*mm, W, 22*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Faixa accent dourada (linha fina embaixo do navy) canv.setFillColor(GOLD) canv.rect(0, H - 24*mm, W, 2*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Faixa teal (abaixo do gold) canv.setFillColor(TEAL) canv.rect(0, H - 25.5*mm, W, 1.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Bloco lateral esquerdo (ornamento) canv.setFillColor(GOLD) canv.rect(0, H - 22*mm, 6*mm, 22*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Bloco lateral direito (ornamento) canv.setFillColor(TEAL) canv.rect(W - 6*mm, H - 22*mm, 6*mm, 22*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Linha decorativa interna (gold fina dentro do navy) canv.setFillColor(GOLD_LIGHT) canv.rect(6*mm, H - 4*mm, W - 12*mm, 0.4*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Texto do header — Título do documento canv.setFont("Helvetica-Bold", 9.5) canv.setFillColor(WHITE) title_text = "PLANO DE AULA | ANÁLISE DE DADOS CORPORAIS COM INTELIGÊNCIA ARTIFICIAL | EDUCAÇÃO FÍSICA ESCOLAR" canv.drawCentredString(W / 2, H - 13*mm, title_text) # Subtítulo pequeno canv.setFont("Helvetica", 6.5) canv.setFillColor(GOLD_LIGHT) canv.drawCentredString(W / 2, H - 18.5*mm, "Versão Institucional e Científica · Ensino Fundamental · BNCC · LDB · LGPD") # ── FOOTER ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── # Faixa teal fina no topo do footer canv.setFillColor(TEAL) canv.rect(0, 16*mm, W, 1.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Faixa gold canv.setFillColor(GOLD) canv.rect(0, 14.5*mm, W, 1.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Faixa navy principal canv.setFillColor(NAVY) canv.rect(0, 0, W, 14.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Ornamento lateral esquerdo footer canv.setFillColor(GOLD) canv.rect(0, 0, 6*mm, 14.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Ornamento lateral direito footer canv.setFillColor(TEAL) canv.rect(W - 6*mm, 0, 6*mm, 14.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) # Texto esquerdo footer canv.setFont("Helvetica", 6.2) canv.setFillColor(GOLD_LIGHT) canv.drawString(10*mm, 9*mm, "EDUCAÇÃO FÍSICA ESCOLAR · CULTURA DIGITAL · INTELIGÊNCIA ARTIFICIAL") canv.setFont("Helvetica", 5.8) canv.setFillColor(colors.lightgrey) canv.drawString(10*mm, 5*mm, "Alinhado: BNCC · LDB (Lei 9.394/96) · LGPD (Lei 13.709/2018) · MEC · CNE") # Número de página (centro) canv.setFont("Helvetica-Bold", 7.5) canv.setFillColor(WHITE) canv.drawCentredString(W / 2, 8*mm, f"— {page_num} —") # Data (direita) canv.setFont("Helvetica", 6.2) canv.setFillColor(GOLD_LIGHT) canv.drawRightString(W - 10*mm, 9*mm, "25/02/2026") canv.setFont("Helvetica", 5.8) canv.setFillColor(colors.lightgrey) canv.drawRightString(W - 10*mm, 5*mm, "Documento gerado com suporte de IA · Validado pelo docente") canv.restoreState() # ─── ESTILOS ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── def build_styles(): s = {} s["cover_title"] = ParagraphStyle("cover_title", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=22, leading=28, textColor=NAVY, alignment=TA_CENTER, spaceAfter=4) s["cover_sub"] = ParagraphStyle("cover_sub", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=11, leading=16, textColor=TEAL, alignment=TA_CENTER, spaceAfter=2) s["section_label"] = ParagraphStyle("section_label", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=7.5, leading=10, textColor=TEAL, spaceBefore=2, spaceAfter=1, leftIndent=0, tracking=60) s["section_title"] = ParagraphStyle("section_title", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=13, leading=17, textColor=NAVY, spaceBefore=4, spaceAfter=3) s["section_title_sm"] = ParagraphStyle("section_title_sm", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=10.5, leading=14, textColor=NAVY_MED, spaceBefore=3, spaceAfter=2) s["body"] = ParagraphStyle("body", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=9, leading=14, textColor=TEXT_DARK, alignment=TA_JUSTIFY, spaceAfter=3) s["body_bold"] = ParagraphStyle("body_bold", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=9, leading=14, textColor=TEXT_DARK, spaceAfter=2) s["bullet"] = ParagraphStyle("bullet", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=8.8, leading=13, textColor=TEXT_MED, leftIndent=14, bulletIndent=4, spaceAfter=1.5) s["bullet_bold"] = ParagraphStyle("bullet_bold", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=8.8, leading=13, textColor=NAVY_MED, leftIndent=14, bulletIndent=4, spaceAfter=1.5) s["caption"] = ParagraphStyle("caption", fontName="Helvetica-Oblique", fontSize=7.5, leading=10, textColor=TEXT_LIGHT, alignment=TA_CENTER, spaceAfter=2) s["tag"] = ParagraphStyle("tag", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=7, leading=10, textColor=WHITE, alignment=TA_CENTER) s["callout"] = ParagraphStyle("callout", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=9.5, leading=14, textColor=NAVY, alignment=TA_CENTER, spaceAfter=2) s["meta"] = ParagraphStyle("meta", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=7.5, leading=10, textColor=TEXT_LIGHT, alignment=TA_CENTER, spaceAfter=1) s["tbl_header"] = ParagraphStyle("tbl_header", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=8, leading=11, textColor=WHITE, alignment=TA_CENTER) s["tbl_cell"] = ParagraphStyle("tbl_cell", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=8, leading=11, textColor=TEXT_DARK, alignment=TA_CENTER) s["tbl_cell_l"] = ParagraphStyle("tbl_cell_l", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=8, leading=11, textColor=TEXT_DARK, alignment=TA_LEFT) s["tbl_cell_bold"] = ParagraphStyle("tbl_cell_bold", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=8, leading=11, textColor=NAVY, alignment=TA_CENTER) s["feedback_icon"] = ParagraphStyle("feedback_icon", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=10, leading=14, textColor=NAVY, alignment=TA_LEFT) return s # ─── UTILITÁRIOS ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── class ColorBox(Flowable): """Retângulo decorativo com texto centralizado.""" def __init__(self, w, h, bg, text="", text_color=WHITE, font="Helvetica-Bold", fsize=9, radius=3): super().__init__() self.w = w; self.h = h; self.bg = bg self.text = text; self.text_color = text_color self.font = font; self.fsize = fsize; self.radius = radius self.width = w; self.height = h def draw(self): self.canv.setFillColor(self.bg) self.canv.roundRect(0, 0, self.w, self.h, self.radius, fill=1, stroke=0) if self.text: self.canv.setFillColor(self.text_color) self.canv.setFont(self.font, self.fsize) self.canv.drawCentredString(self.w / 2, self.h / 2 - self.fsize * 0.35, self.text) def divider(color=TEAL, thickness=0.8, space_before=4, space_after=4): return HRFlowable(width="100%", thickness=thickness, color=color, spaceBefore=space_before, spaceAfter=space_after) def section_header(label, title, styles): """Bloco de cabeçalho de seção com label superior e título.""" elems = [] elems.append(Spacer(1, 5)) elems.append(Paragraph(label.upper(), styles["section_label"])) elems.append(Paragraph(title, styles["section_title"])) elems.append(divider(TEAL, 1.2, 1, 6)) return elems def colored_badge(text, bg=TEAL, styles=None): data = [[Paragraph(text, styles["tag"])]] t = Table(data, colWidths=[3.5*cm], rowHeights=[0.55*cm]) t.setStyle(TableStyle([ ("BACKGROUND", (0,0), (-1,-1), bg), ("ROWBACKGROUNDS", (0,0), (-1,-1), [bg]), ("ROUNDEDCORNERS", [3]), ("LEFTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 4), ("RIGHTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 4), ("TOPPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 3), ("BOTTOMPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 3), ])) return t def highlight_box(content_elements, bg=LIGHT_BG, border_color=TEAL, border_width=2): """Caixa de destaque com borda lateral colorida.""" inner = Table([[content_elements]], colWidths=[W - MARGIN_L - MARGIN_R - 10*mm]) inner.setStyle(TableStyle([ ("BACKGROUND", (0,0), (-1,-1), bg), ("LEFTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ("RIGHTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ("TOPPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 8), ("BOTTOMPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 8), ("LINEBEFORE", (0,0), (0,-1), border_width, border_color), ("LINEAFTER", (0,0), (-1,-1), 0.3, BORDER), ("LINEBELOW", (0,0), (-1,-1), 0.3, BORDER), ("LINEABOVE", (0,0), (0,0), 0.3, BORDER), ])) return inner # ─── CONSTRUÇÃO DO CONTEÚDO ────────────────────────────────────────────────── def build_content(styles): story = [] col_w = W - MARGIN_L - MARGIN_R # ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ # CAPA / TÍTULO PRINCIPAL # ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ story.append(Spacer(1, 8*mm)) # Bloco cover (fundo navy arredondado) cover_data = [[ Paragraph("PLANO DE AULA", ParagraphStyle("cv1", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=8, leading=12, textColor=GOLD_LIGHT, alignment=TA_CENTER, tracking=80)), ]] cover_top = Table(cover_data, colWidths=[col_w]) cover_top.setStyle(TableStyle([ ("BACKGROUND", (0,0), (-1,-1), NAVY), ("TOPPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 8), ("BOTTOMPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 4), ("LEFTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ("RIGHTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ])) story.append(cover_top) cover_main_data = [[ Paragraph( "Introdução à Análise de Dados Corporais
com Inteligência Artificial na
Educação Física Escolar", ParagraphStyle("cm", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=18, leading=24, textColor=WHITE, alignment=TA_CENTER) ) ]] cover_main = Table(cover_main_data, colWidths=[col_w]) cover_main.setStyle(TableStyle([ ("BACKGROUND", (0,0), (-1,-1), NAVY_MED), ("TOPPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 14), ("BOTTOMPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 12), ("LEFTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 14), ("RIGHTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 14), ])) story.append(cover_main) cover_foot_data = [[ Paragraph("Versão Institucional e Científica · Ensino Fundamental · 2026", ParagraphStyle("cf", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=8, leading=12, textColor=GOLD_LIGHT, alignment=TA_CENTER)) ]] cover_foot = Table(cover_foot_data, colWidths=[col_w]) cover_foot.setStyle(TableStyle([ ("BACKGROUND", (0,0), (-1,-1), NAVY), ("TOPPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 6), ("BOTTOMPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ("LEFTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ("RIGHTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ("LINEBELOW", (0,0), (-1,-1), 2.5, GOLD), ])) story.append(cover_foot) story.append(Spacer(1, 5*mm)) # 0.9*cm]) t.setStyle(TableStyle([ ("BACKGROUND", (0,0), (0,0), TEAL if i % 2 == 0 else NAVY), ("BACKGROUND", (1,0), (1,0), STRIPE_1 if i % 2 == 0 else STRIPE_2), ("VALIGN", (0,0), (-1,-1), "MIDDLE"), ("LEFTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 7), ("RIGHTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 7), ("TOPPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 6), ("BOTTOMPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 6), ("LINEBELOW", (0,0), (-1,-1), 0.3, BORDER), ])) story.append(t) story.append(Spacer(1, 1)) story.append(Spacer(1, 8*mm)) # ── Assinatura / Rodapé do documento ────────────────────────────────────── assin_data = [[ Paragraph( "Documento elaborado com suporte de Inteligência Artificial.\n" "Validação final de responsabilidade do docente responsável.", ParagraphStyle("as", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=8, leading=12, textColor=TEXT_LIGHT, alignment=TA_CENTER)) ]] assin_t = Table(assin_data, colWidths=[col_w]) assin_t.setStyle(TableStyle([ ("BACKGROUND", (0,0), (-1,-1), LIGHT_BG2), ("LINEABOVE", (0,0), (-1,0), 1.5, TEAL), ("LINEBELOW", (0,0), (-1,-1), 1.5, GOLD), ("LEFTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 14), ("RIGHTPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 14), ("TOPPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ("BOTTOMPADDING", (0,0), (-1,-1), 10), ])) story.append(assin_t) return story # ─── GERAÇÃO DO PDF ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── def generate_pdf(): os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(OUTPUT), exist_ok=True) doc = SimpleDocTemplate( OUTPUT, pagesize=A4, leftMargin=MARGIN_L, rightMargin=MARGIN_R, topMargin=MARGIN_T, bottomMargin=MARGIN_B, title="Plano de Aula — IA na Educação Física Escolar", author="Equipe Multidisciplinar — Matheus Florindo", subject="Análise de Dados Corporais com IA — Educação Física Escolar", creator="Claude AI + ReportLab", ) styles = build_styles() story = build_content(styles) doc.build(story, onFirstPage=draw_header_footer, onLaterPages=draw_header_footer) print(f"PDF gerado: {OUTPUT}") if __name__ == "__main__": generate_pdf()

#!/usr/bin/env python3 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- """ PDF Ultra Premium — Documentação Técnica Completa Stack tecnológica, prompt exato e código-fonte utilizado para gerar o Plano de Aula IA + Educação Física. """ from reportlab.lib.pagesizes import A4 from reportlab.lib import colors from reportlab.lib.units import mm, cm from reportlab.lib.styles import ParagraphStyle from reportlab.lib.enums import TA_LEFT, TA_CENTER, TA_RIGHT, TA_JUSTIFY from reportlab.platypus import ( SimpleDocTemplate, Paragraph, Spacer, Table, TableStyle, HRFlowable, PageBreak, Preformatted ) from reportlab.lib.colors import HexColor import os, textwrap # ─── PALETA ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── NAVY = HexColor("#0D1B2A") NAVY_MED = HexColor("#1B3A5C") TEAL = HexColor("#0E7C7B") GOLD = HexColor("#C9A227") GOLD_LIGHT = HexColor("#F0D080") WHITE = HexColor("#FFFFFF") LIGHT_BG = HexColor("#F4F7FB") LIGHT_BG2 = HexColor("#EAF0F8") BORDER = HexColor("#BDD0E8") TEXT_DARK = HexColor("#0D1B2A") TEXT_MED = HexColor("#2C4E6C") TEXT_LIGHT = HexColor("#5A7A99") GREEN_OK = HexColor("#1A7A4A") STRIPE_1 = HexColor("#E8F0F8") STRIPE_2 = HexColor("#FFFFFF") CODE_BG = HexColor("#1E293B") CODE_BG2 = HexColor("#0F172A") ACCENT_PURPLE = HexColor("#6C3FA5") ACCENT_ORANGE = HexColor("#D97706") W, H = A4 MARGIN_L = 2.0 * cm MARGIN_R = 2.0 * cm MARGIN_T = 3.2 * cm MARGIN_B = 2.8 * cm COL_W = W - MARGIN_L - MARGIN_R OUTPUT = "/sessions/wonderful-bold-ptolemy/mnt/outputs/Documentacao_Tecnica_Stack_Prompt.pdf" # ─── HEADER & FOOTER ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── def draw_header_footer(canv, doc): canv.saveState() page_num = doc.page # HEADER canv.setFillColor(NAVY) canv.rect(0, H - 22*mm, W, 22*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(GOLD) canv.rect(0, H - 24*mm, W, 2*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(TEAL) canv.rect(0, H - 25.5*mm, W, 1.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(GOLD) canv.rect(0, H - 22*mm, 6*mm, 22*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(TEAL) canv.rect(W - 6*mm, H - 22*mm, 6*mm, 22*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(GOLD_LIGHT) canv.rect(6*mm, H - 4*mm, W - 12*mm, 0.4*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFont("Helvetica-Bold", 9.5) canv.setFillColor(WHITE) canv.drawCentredString(W / 2, H - 13*mm, "DOCUMENTAÇÃO TÉCNICA | STACK TECNOLÓGICA | PROMPT EXATO | CÓDIGO-FONTE") canv.setFont("Helvetica", 6.5) canv.setFillColor(GOLD_LIGHT) canv.drawCentredString(W / 2, H - 18.5*mm, "Relatório de Engenharia de Prompt + Geração de PDF Premium · Claude AI + ReportLab + Python") # FOOTER canv.setFillColor(TEAL) canv.rect(0, 16*mm, W, 1.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(GOLD) canv.rect(0, 14.5*mm, W, 1.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(NAVY) canv.rect(0, 0, W, 14.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(GOLD) canv.rect(0, 0, 6*mm, 14.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFillColor(TEAL) canv.rect(W - 6*mm, 0, 6*mm, 14.5*mm, fill=1, stroke=0) canv.setFont("Helvetica", 6.2) canv.setFillColor(GOLD_LIGHT) canv.drawString(10*mm, 9*mm, "ENGENHARIA DE PROMPT · PYTHON · REPORTLAB · CLAUDE AI · COWORK MODE") canv.setFont("Helvetica", 5.8) canv.setFillColor(colors.lightgrey) canv.drawString(10*mm, 5*mm, "Documentação técnica completa · Matheus Florindo · 2026") canv.setFont("Helvetica-Bold", 7.5) canv.setFillColor(WHITE) canv.drawCentredString(W / 2, 8*mm, f"— {page_num} —") canv.setFont("Helvetica", 6.2) canv.setFillColor(GOLD_LIGHT) canv.drawRightString(W - 10*mm, 9*mm, "25/02/2026") canv.setFont("Helvetica", 5.8) canv.setFillColor(colors.lightgrey) canv.drawRightString(W - 10*mm, 5*mm, "Documento gerado com Claude AI · Anthropic") canv.restoreState() # ─── ESTILOS ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── def S(): s = {} s["section_label"] = ParagraphStyle("sl", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=7.5, leading=10, textColor=TEAL, spaceBefore=2, spaceAfter=1) s["section_title"] = ParagraphStyle("st", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=13, leading=17, textColor=NAVY, spaceBefore=4, spaceAfter=3) s["section_sm"] = leading=14, textColor=TEXT_DARK, alignment=TA_JUSTIFY, spaceAfter=3) s["body_bold"] = ParagraphStyle("bb", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=9, leading=14, textColor=TEXT_DARK, spaceAfter=2) s["caption"] = ParagraphStyle("cap", fontName="Helvetica-Oblique", fontSize=7.5, leading=10, textColor=TEXT_LIGHT, alignment=TA_CENTER, spaceAfter=2) s["tag"] = ParagraphStyle("tag", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=7, leading=10, textColor=WHITE, alignment=TA_CENTER) s["tbl_header"] = ParagraphStyle("th", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=8, leading=11, textColor=WHITE, alignment=TA_CENTER) s["tbl_cell"] = ParagraphStyle("tc", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=8, leading=11, textColor=TEXT_DARK, alignment=TA_CENTER) s["tbl_cell_l"] = ParagraphStyle("tcl", fontName="Helvetica", fontSize=8, leading=11, textColor=TEXT_DARK, alignment=TA_LEFT) s["tbl_cell_bold"] = ParagraphStyle("tcb", fontName="Helvetica-Bold", fontSize=8, leading=11, textColor=NAVY,
